languages.text: {n}Кибелла прищуривается.{/n} "Твой мир чужд мне, Домин'{name}. Но знание его позволит мне лучше служить тебе — и Неумирающему. Дозволь же мне взглянуть на один из ритуалов, что наполняют твою жизнь. Я буду благодарна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла прищуривается.{/n} "Твой мир абсолютно чужд мне, Эним'{name}... но знание его позволит мне лучше служить тебе — и Неумирающему. Дозволь же мне взглянуть на один из ритуалов, что наполняет твою жизнь".

languages.text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла прищуривается.{/n} "Твой мир чужд мне, Домин'{name}. Но знание его позволит мне лучше служить тебе — и Неумирающему. Дозволь же мне взглянуть на один из ритуалов, что наполняют твою жизнь. Я буду благодарна".

traits.locale_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Enim'{name}. And yet knowledge of it could better my service to you and the Undying One. Allow me, then, to see one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

{n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Enim'{name}. And yet knowledge of it could better my service to you and the Undying One. Allow me, then, to see one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

{n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Enim'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I shall do so with gratitude."

{n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Enim'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I shall do so with gratitude."

{n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

{n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

languages.text: {n}Entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Su mundo es totalmente ajeno a mí, Domin'{name}. Sin embargo, conocerlo hasta cierto punto me ayudaría a mejorar el servicio que les presto a usted y al Inmortal. Permítame, pues, observar uno de los rituales que componen su vida. Estaré agradecida de hacerlo».
languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

traits.locale_text: {n}Entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Su mundo es totalmente ajeno a mí, Domin'{name}. Sin embargo, conocerlo hasta cierto punto me ayudaría a mejorar el servicio que les presto a usted y al Inmortal. Permítame, pues, observar uno de los rituales que componen su vida. Estaré agradecida de hacerlo».

languages.text: {n}彼女は眼をすがめる。{/n}「あなたの世界は私にとっては異質なものだ、ドミン・{name}。けれど、そのことを多少なりとも知ることで、私のあなたと不死の者への奉仕はさらに良いものになることだろう。では、あなたの人生にあまたある儀式の一つを見せてほしい。感謝しつつ、見させてもらおう」
languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は眼をすがめる。{/n}「あなたの世界は私にとっては異質なものだ、ドミン・{name}。けれど、そのことを多少なりとも知ることで、私のあなたと不死の者への奉仕はさらに良いものになることだろう。では、あなたの人生にあまたある儀式の一つを見せてほしい。感謝しつつ、見させてもらおう」

languages.text: {n}她眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你的世界对我来说无比陌生，秘者{name}。不过，若是能了解这方面的知识，应该可以帮助我更好地为你服务，更好地侍奉不死之神。既然如此，请允许我观察你生活中的仪式吧，我会带着感激之情进行观察的。”
languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

traits.locale_text: {n}她眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你的世界对我来说无比陌生，秘者{name}。不过，若是能了解这方面的知识，应该可以帮助我更好地为你服务，更好地侍奉不死之神。既然如此，请允许我观察你生活中的仪式吧，我会带着感激之情进行观察的。”

languages.text: {n}Sie kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Eure Welt ist mir fremd, Domin'{name}. Dennoch könnte mir etwas Wissen darüber helfen, Euch und dem Todlosen besser dienlich zu sein. Erlaubt mir also, eines der Rituale zu beobachten, die Euer Leben erfüllen. Ich werde dankbar Zeugin davon werden."
languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Eure Welt ist mir fremd, Domin'{name}. Dennoch könnte mir etwas Wissen darüber helfen, Euch und dem Todlosen besser dienlich zu sein. Erlaubt mir also, eines der Rituale zu beobachten, die Euer Leben erfüllen. Ich werde dankbar Zeugin davon werden."

languages.text: {n}Elle plisse les yeux.{/n} « Je suis étrangère à votre monde, Domin'{name}. Pour autant, une meilleure connaissance de l'univers dans lequel vous évoluez m'aiderait à vous servir au mieux, vous et l'Immortel. Avec votre permission, j'assisterais volontiers à l'un des rituels qui jalonnent votre vie. Ce serait un grand honneur pour moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle plisse les yeux.{/n} « Je suis étrangère à votre monde, Domin'{name}. Pour autant, une meilleure connaissance de l'univers dans lequel vous évoluez m'aiderait à vous servir au mieux, vous et l'Immortel. Avec votre permission, j'assisterais volontiers à l'un des rituels qui jalonnent votre vie. Ce serait un grand honneur pour moi. »

languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Senin dünyan bana yabancı Domin'{name}. Yine de dünyana dair biraz bilgi edinmek, hem sana hem de Ölmeyen'e karşı hizmetimi geliştirmeme yardımcı olabilir. O hâlde hayatını dolduran ayinlerden birini gözlemlememe müsaade et. Bunu memnuniyetle yerine getireceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Your world is alien to me, Domin'{name}. And yet, having some knowledge of it could help me to improve my service to both you and the Undying One. Permit me, then, to observe one of the rituals that fills your life. I will do so with gratitude."
